d:section.d:title: Description
d:section.d:para: This document contains Web Service descriptions for the following services.

d:td.d:para: adds a new local user configuration
changes the password
closes the session
configures an option of the user
opens a session
removes a local user configuration (for a given user on a given machine) from VISHNU
lists the commands
lists the local user configurations
lists the machines that are accessible through VISHNU
lists the options of the user
lists all sessions of the user
reconnects to a session that is still active
updates a local user configuration

d:section.d:title: Description
d:section.d:para: adds a new local user configuration

d:section.d:title: Input (Literal)
d:section.d:para: The input of this method is the document element tns:addLocalAccountRequest having the structure defined by the following table.

d:td.d:para: The sessionKey is the encrypted identifier of the session generated by VISHNU
The userId represents the VISHNU user identifier of the user of the local user configuration
The MachineId represents the identifier of the machine associated to the local user configuration
accLogin represents the login of the user on the associated machine
sshKeyPath is the path of the ssh key of the user on the associated machine
HomeDirectory is the path of the home directory of the user on the associated machine

d:section.d:title: Output (Literal)
d:section.d:para: The output of this method is the document element tns:addLocalAccountResponse having the structure defined by the following table.

d:td.d:para: The SSH public key generated by VISHNU for accessing a local account
The local account already exists
The machine is locked
The userId is unknown
The machine id is unknown
The session key is unrecognized
The sessionKey is expired. The session is closed.
Internal Error: SysDS service failure
Internal Error: Database returned an error
Internal Error: Database connection failure
Internal Error: System call failure
Internal Error: Undefined exception
The machine does not exist or it is locked
